text: Quantification of the levels of cytokines <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL-10 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and TNF and the chemokine <extra_id_0> CXCL8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was performed on culture supernatants using multiplexed biomarker immunoassay kits according to manufacturer 's instructions ( Bio-Rad Laboratories , Hercules , CA ) .
A Bio-Plex ( TM ) 200 readout System was used ( Bio-Rad ) , which utilizes Luminex ( R ) xMAP ( TM ) fluorescent bead-based technology ( Luminex Corp . , Austin ) .
Levels were automatically calculated from standard curves using Bio-Plex Manager software ( v.4.1.1 , Bio-Rad ) .
